Greenhaven also incorporates advanced hydroponics, aeroponics, and LED lighting systems to maximize crop yields while minimizing water and energy consumption.

A futuristic, high-speed transportation system called "Aerotube" that uses vacuum-sealed tubes and magnetic levitation to propel vehicles at speeds of up to 4,000 km/h.
